fields.description:
TestNodeStatusUpdater.testCompletedContainerStatusBackup and TestNMWebServer UT fails with NMWebapps failed to start.

{code}
Error Message

NMWebapps failed to start.
Stacktrace

fields.summary: NM web server related UT fails with "NMWebapps failed to start."

comments.body: This is no longer occurring on trunk since it was fixed as part of YARN-3334.  It is still occurring on branch-2 because that JIRA isn't committed there.
Attaching a patch which is just the TestNMWebServer fix from YARN-3334.
